curl https://api.openai.com/v1/models \
  -H "Authorization: [your own authorization]" \
  -H "OpenAI-Organization: org-FtRkBGz23z2ivHGcq3DDGqll" \
  -H "OpenAI-Project: proj_U5Ir9iyyX8QqAwZ4xNUAbgZc"
  
curl https://api.openai.com/v1/chat/completions \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer [your own authorization]" \
  -d '{
     "model": "gpt-4o-mini",
     "messages": [{"role": "user", "content": "Say this is a test!"}],
     "temperature": 0.7
   }'
